  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    This starts the application, loads the window and sets the stage with the main application page.
    AppController
    Controller of the user's UI experience, holds the user's information and holds their cart, as well as holding the https request methods.
    AppView
    Controls the app.fxml page, including adding items to the cart and logging in/registering.
    BackendService
    Provides Retrofit API with a interface to let it generate the packing and unpacking of Json objects.
    BackendServiceObject
    Represents the setup data for all https requests.
    Cart
    Represents the user's cart of desired items.
    CartItem
    Represents a cart item, which is a product and its quantity chosen to be bought.
    CartView
    Controls the cart.fxml page, including showing your cart items with a checkout option.
    CheckoutView
    Controls the checkout.fxml page, displaying the order data and the crypto QR code to make an actual purchase.
    CreateAccountController
    Controls all create account attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    CreateAccountObj
    Represents a create account https send data object.
    DeleteCartController
    Controls all delete cart attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    GetAllProductsController
    Controls all get all products attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    GetAllUserOrdersController
    Controls all get all of a user's orders attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    GetCartController
    Controls all get cart attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    GetProductController
    Controls all get product attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    HollowCartObj
    Represents a backend cart item object.
    Listener<E>
    Listener Interface for Observable booleans.
    LoginController
    Controls all login attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    LoginObj
    Represents a login https send data object.
    LoginView
    Controls the login.fxml page, including registering or logging in a user.
    Main
    Launches the main App FXApplication, which can therefore have its methods called statically.
    MakeOrderController
    Controls all make order attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
    Observable<E>
    Allows for making Observable variables active listeners with a subscribe method.
    OrderTransaction
    Represents a order transaction object with the cart and all purchase data.
    Product
    Represents a product, with ID, name, image, price, and total quantity.
    ProductBox
    Represents a FX box that holds the data about a product, including its name, price, and and image of it.
    SceneCoordinator
    Represents a static scene object that controls the loading of the .fxml scenes.
    SuccessfulAccountCreatedUser
    Represents a create account https return data object.
    SuccessfulLoginToken
    Represents a login https return data object.
    UpdateCartController
    Controls all update cart attempt logic, handles sending a request via Retrofit API and the responses as well.
